titleStmt.title: Caledonias covenant, or, Ane panegyrick to the world vvherein is brieflie set doune the trew caus and occasioune of the present trubles of the kingdome of Scotland / by G. L.
titleStmt.author: Lauder, George, b. ca. 1600.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
